selector.label: X Series
selector.info: The X series is for those serious about music. Every handset in the series comes with separate media controls, great speakers, FM radio and a 3.5 mm headphone jack. Nokia Comes with Music is included in many of the handsets and Ovi Music offers even more choice. The X Series also offers excellent internal memory and option for further storage via an external memory card.

selector.label: N Series
selector.info: The Nokia N Series are high quality smartphones, aimed at users looking to pack as many features as possible into one device. A few highlights for the Series are Carl Zeiss camera optics, 3G, WLAN and now also HD video capture.

selector.label: C Series
selector.info: The C Series is Nokia's social communications series, ideal for those that cannot live without staying connected at all times. The series has a large set of Candy-bar phones but also feature qwerty and slide phones. Ovi Mail, Nokia Messenging, pre-loaded social media apps like Twitter, Facebook, MySpace etc, makes it easy to chat and share content.

selector.label: E Series
selector.info: The Nokia E Series consists of business-oriented smartphones, with emphasis on enhanced connectivity and support for corporate em-mail push services. All devices have advanced office features.

selector.label: Up to 2 MP
selector.info: Good for everyday photos for MMS or for uploading to social network profiles. Ideal for sharing online or for viewing on a mobile handset

selector.label: 3.2 MP
selector.info: A good choice for everyday photos, for sharing online or via email and for viewing as digital slideshows.

selector.label: 5 MP
selector.info: A good all-round choice for holiday snaps, social events and everyday photography. Ideal for sharing online or by email, or for viewing as digital slideshows. It’s also fine for small sized prints.

selector.label: 8 MP
selector.info: High quality photos at print quality resolution. Gives good all-round usage from MMSing to TV resolution viewing, and print up to A3

selector.label: Over 8 MP
selector.info: Top of the range camera resolution and will cover all needs from everyday to advanced. Please note that the high-res images will also use a lot of memory for storage.

selector.label: Up to 100 MB
selector.info: Memory for incoming/outgoing messages and MMS/thumbnail photos only

selector.label: 100-300 MB
selector.info: Large memory for basic functions like storing low resolution photos or saving a small amount of MP3s

selector.label: 1-2 GB
selector.info: Mid-level storage capacity- will allow for storing photos and albums, but not sufficient for high-res photos or storing a large music-collection

selector.label: 16 GB
selector.info: Large capacity allows for lots of music storage and for other multimedia content

selector.label: 32 GB
selector.info: Larger than average capacity - more than sufficient for a large music collection as well as high-res photos, photo albums and video content

selector.label: Over 32 GB
selector.info: Top-range for storage capacity, will allow for a seemingly unlimited amount of photos, music, videos and work documents

selector.label: Classic
selector.info: The traditional candy-bar phone - with screen covering top half and standard numeric keyboard at the bottom half.

selector.label: Fold
selector.info: Clam-shell style phone - keeps the screen and the keyboard protected when not in use

selector.label: Slide
selector.info: Combines a full-size screen with a numerical or qwerty keyboard for speedy typing. Great for video viewing and actions requiring a big screen

selector.label: Touch Phone
selector.info: Allows for easy access to content by using the touch screen as well as standard UI keys

selector.label: Large Screen
selector.info: Large screen is ideal for video viewing and for chat-strings and multi-tasking

selector.label: QWERTY
selector.info: The traditional candy-bar phone - with screen covering top half and standard numeric keyboard at the bottom half.

selector.label: Bluetooth
selector.info: Bluetooth is a wireless technology that enables communication between Bluetooth-compatible devices, allowing for file and content transfer e.g. from mobile to mobile or mobile to PC.

selector.label: Browser
selector.info: Allows for viewing internet pages on your mobile device.

selector.label: Email
selector.info: Computer communication format enabling users to send and receive messages electronically between devices

selector.label: 2G
selector.info: Second generation wireless telephone technology. Digitally allows for transmitting via the phone networks and is synonymous with GSM - medium speed.

selector.label: 3G
selector.info: Third generation wireless telephone technology, faster than 2G, utilising high-speed technology that allows for transmitting rich media like video and live communication

selector.label: Radio
selector.info: Radio player allows for listening to radio stations transmitting in the area you're in

selector.label: Music Player
selector.info: Take your music with you wherever you go with the music enabled devices from Nokia

selector.label: Video
selector.info: Video capture and playback functionality built into the device - watch and share video content

selector.label: HD Video
selector.info: High Quality video content can be captured and shared. Play-back on connected devices like TV or computer screens.

selector.label: Wi-Fi
selector.info: Internet connection whenever you're in a Wi-Fi zone, allows you to browse the web whilst out and about

selector.label: Speaker Phone
selector.info: Play your music not only through your headphones but also out loud- whether at home or out with friends

selector.label: Video Playback
selector.info: Watch both downloaded and captured video content on the handset - no need to transfer to computer or DVD!

selector.label: Push Email
selector.info: A method of having emails received on your standard email accounts pushed to your mobile device in real-time. Ideal for those that need to keep on top of their communication

selector.label: GPS Navigation
selector.info: Allows the handset to receive GPS (Global Positioning System) signals for determining the exact location of the handset at any one time. Allows for real-time navigation using e.g. Ovi Maps or other map services

selector.label: Apps
selector.info: An App is a piece of software which can be downloaded and used on a mobile device. There are many types of Apps, including games, office tools, live sports feeds and Apps that will help you find things, like good restaurants, location of friends or where you parked your car

selector.label: Less than £100
selector.info: Cheap...

selector.label: £100 to £200
selector.info: Mid-range...

selector.label: £200 to £300
selector.info: Expensive...
Executive...
